address_field.description: Receiver address, normally shown in envelope window. Defaults to client address_field if empty and client_id given.

date.description: Date the payment_reminder is issued. Automatically set when payment_reminder is opened. Required for non-draft documents.

due_days.description: Used to calculate the due date of the payment_reminder. Useless if date and due date are present.

due_date.description: Auto-calculated from date + due days if empty and the payment_reminder is opened.

title.description: The headline of a document. Use SK placeholders to prevent exessive typing e.g. 'Your payment_reminder [number]'

notes_before.description: Notes shown before the line items. Normaly contains salutation and other introductional information. SK placeholders can be used.

notes_after.description: Notes shown after the line items. Can contain information about payments, bank account or a thank-you message. SK placeholders can be used.

precision.description: Decimal places for displayed(printed) money values. gross_total and net_total will always be displayed rounded to a precision of 2. When greater 2 use net_total_base(also in line_item) to show the net val with the set precision(3,4).

archived_pdf.description: Archived PDF version of the document. Is created when an document is printed and archived. A document can have multiple archived versions. This only returns the most recent one.

client.description: The client for the document. New documents cannot create a client, use client_id field to set it.

client_id.description: The clients uuid. New payment_reminders take the clients address field, due days and cash discount if those fields are not set.

team_id.description: A team uuid. If set only the team and its parent teams can see the record.

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards.

updated_at.description: Date the object was edited in SK.

lock_version.description: Auto-incremented to prevent concurrent updateing. First save wins and increments version.

gross_total.description: Gross total of all line items, 2 decimals places

page.title: Page
page.description: In paginated results set the page to look for

filter[tags].title: Tags
filter[tags].description: Filter by a space delimited list of tags

filter[from].title: From date
filter[from].description: All objects with a date after the date

filter[to].title: To date
filter[to].description: All objects with date before the date

sort_by.title: Sort by
sort_by.description: Sort the results by the given field => number

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Sort the results in ASC or DESC

template_id.title: PDF template used for printing
template_id.description: UUID of a pdf template used to print the document. MUST be present

base64.title: Return the created pdf base64 encoded
base64.description: If set the new pdf is returned inside the attachment JSON within 'base64' key. Leave empty to save traffic.
